me hethuwa nisa pothuwil arugambe margaya paya dekaka pamana kalayak gamana gamana katayuthu ana sitiya.pasuwa ema sthanayata pamini nangenahira disawa bhara niyojya polispathi ranjith wirasuriya mahatha saha kottasa bhara polis adhikariwaraya margayen iwathwena lesata illimak kalada wirodhatha karuwo eyata ekaga nowuha.nangenahira disawa bhara niyojya polispathi ranjith wirasuriya mahatha gen likhitha prakashayak denathuru margaye sitina bawa wirodhatha karuwo ehidi prakasha kalaha.pasuwa dina 03k athulathadi pansala dosar karana lada sakakaru athadanguwata ganimath, kada winasha karana lada godanagilla milanga poyata pera eya winasha kala pudgalayama lawa sakaskara dimatath niyojya polispathiwaraya likhithawa poronduwak dima nisa mahasangharathnaya saha udghoshakayo margayen iwathwuha.me idam gataluwa pilibandawa pothuwil pradeshiya maha lekam yu.el. niyas mahathagen wimasu wita ohu pawasuwe danata sama wiharaya idikara thibena sthanaye balapathrayak nomathi bawayi.
